title: Web Developer for Chime for Change
description:
[www.chimeforchange.org](http://www.chimeforchange.org)\
Take in charge, development and maintenance of the website using Ruby on Rails and Refinery CMS.

* Website developed in RWD (responsive web design) and TDD (test driven development).
* This experience gave me the chance to know more about crowdfunding (www.catapult.org).
